meanings.definition: A wild horse of a now-extinct breed that once roamed the Eurasian steppes.
meanings.sent1: Tarpans were known for their strong and sturdy build.
meanings.sent2: The tarpans grazed peacefully in the vast grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children pretended to ride imaginary tarpans around the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as untamed as a herd of tarpans running free.
meanings.sent5: The image of the majestic tarpans galloping under the open sky stayed with him forever.
